items.text: SL are appeaking for a catch. Chandimal and Dananjaya are pretty sure. They gather for a conference and Chandimal goes for the review. This is the legbreak. Mahmudullah is playing for the turn and the ball spins the other way to beat the edge. Or has it kissed the edge? That's the question. No spike on Ultraedge and SL lose their review
